## TouchGesture.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `TouchGesture` class

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(e: Event, creatorWorkspace: WorkspaceSvg);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  e | Event | The event that kicked off this gesture. |
|  creatorWorkspace | [WorkspaceSvg](./blockly.workspacesvg.md) | The workspace that created this gesture and has a reference to it. |
